features: Complete Screen Cleaning Solution: Betron's comprehensive 500ml screen cleaning kit is designed to provide a thorough cleaning experience for all your electronic devices; it includes two microfiber cloths and a soft brush to ensure every part of your screen is spotless

Advanced Cleaning Formula: Our kit features a specially formulated cleaning solution that effectively removes smudges, fingerprints, dust, and other debris from your screens; this solution is gentle yet powerful, leaving your devices looking as good as new without any streaks or residue

Dual Cloth for Optimal Results: With our dual cloth system, you can achieve professional-grade cleaning results; apply the cleaning solution with one microfiber cloth to loosen dirt and grime, then use the second cloth to wipe away any remaining residue for a pristine finish

Gentle Brush for Stubborn Debris: For stubborn dirt or debris, our kit includes a soft brush that can be used to gently dislodge particles without causing any damage to your screens; this brush ensures thorough cleaning without scratching or harming your devices

Versatile and Convenient: Whether you need to clean your LED or HD TV, PC monitor, tablet, smartphone, or other electronic devices, our screen cleaning kit has you covered; its versatility and ease of use make it perfect for both home and office use, ensuring your screens remain clear and vibrant
description: Product Description 500ML Screen Cleaner 200ml Screen Cleaner 100ml Screen Cleaner 100ml Screen Cleaner Pocket Size Screen Cleaner Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,212 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,154 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,677 4.4 out of 5 stars 4,005 4.3 out of 5 stars 337 Price £11.35 £ 11 . 35 £8.90 £ 8 . 90 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £8.85 £ 8 . 85 £6.99 £ 6 . 99 Size 500ml 200ml 100ml 100ml 12ml Microfibre Cloth 2 2 2 1 1 Brush Included ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ no data A specially formulated screen cleaning kit to work effectively on LCD, LED, TFT, HD TV s, Plasma, touchscreen, smartphones, TV Screens, Tablets, Keyboards, E-readers Ultra soft product, non-abrasive microfibre cloths will not scratch paints, coats or other surfaces The soft microfibre used in these cloths is super absorbent and made to trap dirt, grime, and other particles without leaving any lint or streak residue behind or scratching paints, coats, or other surfaces. The soft, non-abrasive microfiber material can absorb eight times its own weight Apply a small amount to the surface to be cleaned and wipe gently with a suitable soft clean cloth Dust, dirt and marks are easily removed leaving a clean smooth finish. Can be used on ANY monitor screen Anti static protection to slow the build up of static dust Simple and easy to use 500ml spray bottle Screen Cleaning Kit Betron Screen Cleaner Everything ends up on your Tech Devices. Betron products makes it easy for you to clean all your screens For all types of Screens including Smartphones, iPads, Computer screens , Laptops, e-Readers, TV's , Eyeglasses and more Give your electronics the love they deserve - Make them shine like new No Scratches – Why risk scratching your expensive new TV or laptop screen with a cheap screen cleaner includes 500ml large bottle, 2 Microfibre cloths, dust brush Microfiber Glasses Cloth Extremely high-quality, soft, microfiber material allow them to remove stains with safety, won't leave any scratch. In addition, its properties also ensure that it won't leave any lint, mark, or streak on the surface. Ideal to clean all the delicate surface Ultra Soft Microfibre cleaning Cloths Quickly and easily absorbs and removes all the dust, oil, smudges, fingerprints, and dirt without chemicals. Our Microfiber cloth is unmatched in its ability to thoroughly clean delicate surfaces without risk of damage. What is Included 500ml Screen Cleaning Liquid 500ml bottle which will keep you going for a very long time. It is in a transparent spray top bottle which allows you to see when you are running low and need to re-order some more 2 Lint Free MicroFibre Cloths Great for cleaning eyeglasses, glasses, lenses, cell phones, iPad, screens, cameras, and all the delicate surface or device. In addition, its large size makes it possible to clean the larger screen and more comfortable to hold Anti Static Dust Brush Soft brush is used to clean the screen from dust, such as cameras and computers and will not scratch your screen 500ml Screen Cleaning Kit How to use your screen cleaner Unplug your Screen before you begin. Clean the frame of your TV with a soft, clean, lint free, dry cloth that is included with your cleaning kit To clean the screen, first try wiping gently with the soft, clean, lint free, dry cloth. If that does not work, spray Screen Cleaner onto the cloth. Never spray it directly onto your TV screen. Wipe the screen with the cloth as gently as possible. TV screens are fragile and can be damaged if you press too hard. Let the screen dry completely before you plug the Screen back in.
